name: mlb-database
description: ## Instructions In the initial commit to this project you have been provided with data about the stats accumulated by MLB players on a single day of games. You are tasked with creating an Entity Relationship Diagram in [Lucidchart](https://www.lucidchart.com/) to represent a normalized database design for storing this data. When you have completed your chart create a PNG image of it (File -> Export -> PNG) and save it to your repo.
